basics.name: Jack Bishop
basics.label: Nuclear Physicist
basics.summary: Experimental Nuclear Physicist specialising in TPCs, Nuclear Structure and neutron experiments

work.name: University of Birmingham
work.summary: Research and teaching within the School of Physics & Astronomy with research interests focused on the use of the University's two particle accelerators, the Birmingham MC40 Cyclotron and the new High-Flux Accelerator-Driven Neutron Facility, HF-ADNeF.
highlights: Experimental nuclear, neutron experiments, nuclear astrophysics, TPCs, nuclear structure, nuclear spectroscopy
